A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This was by far the worst Star Wars movie ever. Not One Plot build up over these most recent episodes led to anything\, no questions were answered\, there were direct contradictions to not only episode 7 but all the episodes\, Luke’s Character was completely destroyed\, Snoke’s character was pointless and the end of the film you don’t even care who wins in the end because so much built up potential was lost. One of the worst movies I ever saw and I honestly wish I never saw it. Equal to the Avatar the last Airbender and Dragon Ball movie.
